message.body: Noah! Yo. Hope you are well. Planning on shooing the rest of episode 2 and the entirety of 3 on May the 7th. A Monday. We could use your help. In the meantime we will need a few things. I will keep you posted. But we have a pressing matter.

The sign ontop of the hour glass does not read. We shot the scene, but I need to plug the more clear sign in in post. You have some time in the next week to further carve it out or make it look more clear?
Sure, I'll darken the letters on it to make it more clear. I will be working on shoots until the 30th but can link up with you on the 1st. I'll keep the 7th open for the shoot
Will need the letters before then. ASAP if you are around. Video goes live on the first.

Well if you can drop it off tomm morning or tonight I could do it real quick and then grab it from me in the evening. I am prepping for a shoot in NYC tomm and I won't be back in Philly until late the 30th
Haha the tub scene looks awesome
Also, if it's currently in woody's possession, I am in port Richmond waiting at a doctors office right now
